amendment.description: Amendment sought to institute domestic sourcing requirements for dinnerware within the Department of Defense.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 115-702 to institute domestic sourcing requirements for dinner ware within the Department of Defense.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 252 (Roll no. 225).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. McKinley.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
